# LibraryPlaylistSortProperties

**Protocol**

Playlist properties your app uses to sort results for a library request.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol LibraryPlaylistSortProperties
```

## Instance Properties

- **lastPlayedDate**: The date when the user last played the playlist on this device.
- **libraryAddedDate**: The date when the user added the playlist to the library.
- **name**: The name of the playlist.

items.description: The date when the user last played the playlist on this device.
items.name: lastPlayedDate

items.description: The date when the user added the playlist to the library.
